SEARCH
Package JEST.controller

Class ConsoleController

java.lang.Object
JEST.controller.ConsoleController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameController
public class ConsoleController extends Object implements GameController
Console implementation of the GameInterface. All interactions happen through the console using Scanner.

    • askChooseOffer

      public int[] askChooseOffer(Player player, String jest, List<Player> availablePlayers)
      Description copied from interface: GameController
      Ask a player to choose an offer.
      Specified by:
      askChooseOffer in interface GameController
      Parameters:
      player - the player choosing
      jest - the player's current jest
      availablePlayers - the list of players with available offers
      Returns:
      an array with [playerIndex, cardChoice] where cardChoice is 1 for face-up, 2 for face-down
